item.title: CVE-2024-32546|2024-04-17T08:21:30.969Z -- Adam Bowen -- Tax Rate Upload
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Adam Bowen Tax Rate Upload allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Tax Rate Upload: from n/a through 2.4.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-31105|2024-04-02T17:33:57.578Z -- Adam Bowen -- Tax Rate Upload
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Adam Bowen Tax Rate Upload allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Tax Rate Upload: from n/a through 2.4.5.
